minebackup.restore.kick: §6[MineBackup] §eRestoring save, server will close shortly, please reconnect later...
minebackup.handshake.version_incompatibl: §c[MineBackup] §4Warning: Plugin version §f%s §4is lower than main program's required minimum version §f%s§4, some features may not work properly!
minebackup.usage:
§eUsage: /mb <subcommand>
§7Available subcommands:
 §b/mb save §7- Save all worlds
 §b/mb list_configs §7- List backup configs
 §b/mb list_worlds <config_id> §7- List worlds in config
 §b/mb list_backups <config_id> <world_index> §7- List backup files
 §b/mb backup <config_id> <world_index> [note] §7- Execute backup
 §b/mb restore <config_id> <world_index> <backup_file> §7- Execute restore
 §b/mb quicksave [note] §7- Quick save and backup current world
 §b/mb quickrestore [backup_file] §7- Quick restore current world
 §b/mb auto <config_id> <world_index> <interval_seconds> §7- Start auto backup
 §b/mb stop <config_id> <world_index> §7- Stop auto backup
 §b/mb snap <config_id> <world_index> <backup_file> §7- WorldEdit snapshot integration
minebackup.error.not_player: §cThis command can only be executed by a player.
minebackup.error.no_world_found: §cCould not find the world you are in.
minebackup.error.no_config_found: §cCould not find config for the current world.
minebackup.error.no_backup_found: §cCould not find backup file for the current world.
minebackup.error.no_permission: §cYou do not have permission to use this command.
